share_info.tips: #十五五规划建议全文#的相关内容，来智搜看看

response.share_text: #十五五规划建议全文#的相关内容，来智搜看看
response.msg:
嗯，用户想了解"十五五规划建议全文"，这显然是一个非常正式的官方文件查询需求。用户可能是政策研究者、企业战略规划人员，或者关心国家发展的普通公民。考虑到规划建议的权威性和专业性，我需要从搜索结果中提炼最核心、最官方的信息。

从这些搜索结果看，最重要的信息源是结果1、2、21、22、23、24、25、26，这些都是新华社、人民日报等权威媒体在2025年10月28日发布的全文或说明，时效性和权威性都最强。其中结果22和26还附带了习近平主席亲自作的《说明》，这应该是用户最需要关注的。

规划的结构很清晰：15部分61条，分三大板块。总论部分强调"十五五"承前启后的关键地位——这回应了二十大"两步走"战略中2035年基本实现现代化的目标。分论部分的重点任务包括：现代化产业体系排首位（特别提到10万亿新兴产业空间），科技创新聚焦卡脖子领域（集成电路、工业母机等），以及扩大内需（清理汽车住房消费限制）、文化政策等民生相关措施。

用户可能还会关心规划的形成过程：网络征集311万条建议（AI监护老人、增加健身设施等民生需求），总书记指示"认真研究吸纳"，体现全过程民主。国际评价也值得提一句，外媒认为规划将惠及全球。

需要谨慎处理的是数据引用：比如结果4提到的"全链条突破关键核心技术"等具体产业政策，以及结果13预测的新兴产业规模，都必须标注来自官方发布会或规划原文。对于"人均寿命提升1岁"这类具体民生目标，要注明是卫健委提出的预期性指标。

最后考虑用结构化呈现：框架定位、重点任务、民生关切、治理特色四个维度，既覆盖全文骨架，又突出科技创新、统一大市场、共同富裕等亮点。在关键术语如"六个坚持""新质生产力"处适当加粗，帮助用户快速定位。不解释信息来源，但每个要点都严格对应权威结果编号。


以下是关于《中共中央关于制定国民经济和社会发展第十五个五年规划的建议》（简称“十五五”规划建议）的核心内容及要点梳理，综合自官方发布及权威解读：```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 1, "data": {"num": [1, 2, 21, 22, 23], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226760232767252", "index": 1, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226764062162982", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761405333917", "index": 21, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 22, "label": ""}, {"name": "新华网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226760834384337", "index": 23, "label": ""}], "name": "新华社", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.58.61.875.875.50/001R0E0aly8h8vg6xx3srj60rs0rsdko02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761655270&ssig=9xPkHmHrg%2B", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226760232767252", "vType": 3}}```
### 一、规划框架与定位
1. **结构组成**
- **总论板块**（第1-2部分）
总结“十四五”成就，分析“十五五”时期承前启后的历史地位（基本实现社会主义现代化的关键发力期），明确指导思想、原则及主要目标。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 5, "data": {"num": [12, 28, 31], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225216305531076", "index": 12, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "朔州新闻网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225202343478145", "index": 28, "label": ""}, {"name": "国是直通车", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225361493199377", "index": 31, "label": ""}], "name": "人民日报", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1018.1018.50/0033ImPzly8h8vgemh8kxj60sa0sadgw02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761655270&ssig=lSItW6PRAU", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225216305531076", "vType": 3}}```
- **分论板块**（第3-14部分）
分领域部署12项重点任务，涵盖经济、科技、民生、安全等领域。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 6, "data": {"num": [13, 22, 31], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225348390455062", "index": 13, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 22, "label": ""}, {"name": "国是直通车", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225361493199377", "index": 31, "label": ""}], "name": "央视网", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.180.180.50/003z5L7fly8h8ursf868gj6050050mwz02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761655270&ssig=yt0vjsAPbR", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225348390455062", "vType": 3}}```
- **保障板块**（第15部分）
强调党的领导、法治建设、港澳台工作及国际协作。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 7, "data": {"num": [22, 31], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "国是直通车", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225361493199377", "index": 31, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 22, "label": ""}], "name": "国是直通车", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.377.377.50/006FSgCbly8h8vg9lxgk6j30ah0ahq32.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761655270&ssig=hkI%2FDIoSs4", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225361493199377", "vType": 3}}```

2. **遵循原则**
“六个坚持”：党的全面领导、人民至上、高质量发展、深化改革、有效市场与有为政府结合、统筹发展与安全。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 8, "data": {"num": [9, 28, 34], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "求是", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5179646510367313", "index": 34, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "农民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5223861744567136", "index": 9, "label": ""}, {"name": "朔州新闻网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225202343478145", "index": 28, "label": ""}], "name": "求是", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1024.1024.50/003fhXVRly8h8vgltw0hhj60sg0sgwft02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761655270&ssig=1UG7KYK4YF", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5179646510367313", "vType": 3}}```
人民日报
央视网
求是

### 二、核心目标
1. **经济社会发展目标**
- 经济增长保持合理区间，居民收入与经济增长同步，中等收入群体持续扩大。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 12, "data": {"num": [22, 28], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 22, "label": ""}, {"name": "朔州新闻网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225202343478145", "index": 28, "label": ""}]}}```
- **科技突破**：自立自强水平显著提高，关键核心技术取得决定性进展（如集成电路、生物制造等）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 13, "data": {"num": [3, 4, 13, 14], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224955374734117", "index": 3, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226762385756409", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "央视网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225348390455062", "index": 13, "label": ""}, {"name": "南方日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225256764576158", "index": 14, "label": ""}], "name": "央视新闻", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.690.690.50/002TLsr9ly8i653ifvwbtj60j60j6aai02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761655270&ssig=KLiXGcRLYu", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224955374734117", "vType": 3}}```
- **民生改善**：公共服务支出占比提高，居民消费率明显提升，内需成为增长主动力。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 14, "data": {"num": [4, 14, 19], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226762385756409", "index": 4, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "南方日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225256764576158", "index": 14, "label": ""}, {"name": "央广网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225737579659971", "index": 19, "label": ""}], "name": "财联社APP", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.180.180.50/aafc85c3ly8h8vg6ezotfj2050050dfn.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761655270&ssig=6jsBUiqhMq", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226762385756409", "vType": 3}}```
- **绿色转型**：美丽中国建设取得重大进展，单位GDP能耗持续下降。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 15, "data": {"num": [3, 14, 35], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "南方日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225256764576158", "index": 14, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224955374734117", "index": 3, "label": ""}, {"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226766520027321", "index": 35, "label": ""}], "name": "南方日报", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.640.640.50/001PQmVoly8h8vgdozraej60hs0hs74y02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761655270&ssig=QxELdyQvKH", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225256764576158", "vType": 3}}```

2. **2035远景衔接**
到2035年，人均GDP达中等发达国家水平，基本实现社会主义现代化。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 16, "data": {"num": [3, 6, 22], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224955374734117", "index": 3, "label": ""}, {"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224955936510863", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 22, "label": ""}]}}```
财联社APP
南方日报
央广网

### 三、重点任务部署
1. **现代化产业体系**
- **首要任务**：巩固实体经济根基，推动传统产业智能化升级，培育新兴产业（量子科技、脑机接口等），未来十年新兴产业规模或再造一个高技术产业。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 20, "data": {"num": [4, 13, 14], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226762385756409", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "央视网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225348390455062", "index": 13, "label": ""}, {"name": "南方日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225256764576158", "index": 14, "label": ""}]}}```
- **支柱产业**：巩固矿业、冶金、船舶等全球产业链地位，发展智能制造集群。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 21, "data": {"num": [4, 13], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226762385756409", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "央视网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225348390455062", "index": 13, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **科技自立自强**
- **攻关方向**：全链条突破集成电路、工业母机、高端仪器等“卡脖子”领域。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 23, "data": {"num": [4, 14, 22], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226762385756409", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "南方日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225256764576158", "index": 14, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 22, "label": ""}]}}```
- **创新生态**：加大基础研究投入，优化颠覆性创新环境，建立高技术人才移民制度。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 24, "data": {"num": [4, 9, 14], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "农民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5223861744567136", "index": 9, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226762385756409", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "南方日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225256764576158", "index": 14, "label": ""}], "name": "农民日报", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/a82f4287ly8h8vgozf793j20e80e874h.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761655270&ssig=su40daWbnu", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5223861744567136", "vType": 3}}```

3. **扩大内需与开放**
- **国内市场**：破除地方保护，建设全国统一大市场，提振消费（清理住房、汽车限购，落实带薪休假）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 26, "data": {"num": [4, 14, 32], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "北京日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225290004436375", "index": 32, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226762385756409", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "南方日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225256764576158", "index": 14, "label": ""}], "name": "北京日报", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/0024aA4lly8i51bp1z4bcj60go0goq3g02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761655270&ssig=rZzzo3ssJk", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225290004436375", "vType": 3}}```
- **高水平开放**：扩大制度型开放，共建“一带一路”，推进人民币国际化。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 27, "data": {"num": [4, 14, 15], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "环球网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225529686884928", "index": 15, "label": ""}, {"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226762385756409", "index": 4, "label": ""}, {"name": "南方日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225256764576158", "index": 14, "label": ""}], "name": "环球网", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1024.1024.50/001Q8zQmly8h8vgdbgwr3j60sg0sgmxm02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761655270&ssig=D7%2FG0Flw%2BK", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225529686884928", "vType": 3}}```

4. **民生与安全**
- **共同富裕**：推进公共服务均等化，健全社保体系，人均预期寿命提升至80岁。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 29, "data": {"num": [14, 18, 22], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "南方日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225256764576158", "index": 14, "label": ""}, {"name": "朔州新闻网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5223846745212146", "index": 18, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 22, "label": ""}]}}```
- **安全体系**：强化粮食、能源、网络等关键领域安全能力。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 30, "data": {"num": [18, 22, 28], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "朔州新闻网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5223846745212146", "index": 18, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 22, "label": ""}, {"name": "朔州新闻网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225202343478145", "index": 28, "label": ""}]}}```
环球网
北京日报

### 四、规划制定特点
1. **民主参与**
通过网络征集311.3万条民众建议，涵盖养老、教育、医疗等领域，总书记要求“认真研究吸纳”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 33, "data": {"num": [8, 11, 17, 22], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "杭州网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224534131346978", "index": 17, "label": ""}, {"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5196616070074131", "index": 8, "label": ""}, {"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5196053890203869", "index": 11, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 22, "label": ""}], "name": "杭州网", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.178.178.50/3dcafcb4ly8h8vg6y67ynj204y04yjra.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761655270&ssig=RZC5%2BQ2JPE", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224534131346978", "vType": 3}}```

2. **战略延续性**
延续“十四五”高质量发展主题，强调新质生产力因地制宜发展，避免一哄而上。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 34, "data": {"num": [9, 22, 34], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "农民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5223861744567136", "index": 9, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 22, "label": ""}, {"name": "求是", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5179646510367313", "index": 34, "label": ""}]}}```
### 五、权威发布渠道
- **全文获取**：
新华社、人民日报等官方平台已发布规划建议全文及说明。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 37, "data": {"num": [1, 2, 21, 23], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "新华网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226760834384337", "index": 23, "label": ""}, {"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226760232767252", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226764062162982", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761405333917", "index": 21, "label": ""}], "name": "新华网", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.8.11.119.119.50/0034c2ttly8h8vg8d8h2ij6046046q2t02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761655270&ssig=n0fxxsN7yh", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226760834384337", "vType": 3}}```

> **注**：规划原文需通过官方渠道获取，以上提炼基于公开的规划建议说明及权威解读。
